doc.name: loadImage
doc.description: Load a png or jpeg image

doc.name: image
doc.description: Draw an image to the screen

arguments.description: The x position of the image
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The y position of the image
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: The width of the image, if not specified, using source width
arguments.name: [w]

arguments.description: The height of the image, if not specified, using source height
arguments.name: [h]

doc.name: Image.crop
doc.description: Crop an Image into an other Image

arguments.description: The x position of the image
arguments.name: x

arguments.description: The y position of the image
arguments.name: y

arguments.description: The width of the new cropped image
arguments.name: w

arguments.description: The height of the new cropped image
arguments.name: h
